data.question: What is the decomposition temperature (Tdec) of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6)?
Which compound is a primary explosive among the ones studied?
Is bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7) more or less sensitive than hexanitrostilbene (HNS) based on impact sensitivity?
data.answer: More sensitive, as its impact sensitivity is 4 J compared to HNS's 5 J.

data.question: True or False: The detonation velocity (Vdet) of bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7) is higher than that of CL-20 according to LASEM results.
What is the estimated experimental detonation performance (Vdet(exp)) of bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7)?
Which compound has the highest calculated positive enthalpy of formation among the ones studied?
True or False: The synthesis of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6) involves a reaction with sodium hydroxide.
What is the impact sensitivity of bis(4-diazo-5-nitro-3-oxopyrazolyl)methane (8)?
True or False: The thermal stability of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6) is lower than that of bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7).
Which compound is identified as having superior properties to diazodinitrophenol (DDNP)?
True or False: All compounds studied can be synthesized economically.
What is the role of diiodomethane in the synthesis of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6)?
data.answer: It is reacted with sodium 4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolate to yield bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6).

data.question: True or False: The reaction of compound 6 with in situ generated nitrous acid produces a secondary explosive.
What is the density of bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7) at 173 K?
True or False: The synthesis of bis(4-diazo-5-nitro-3-oxopyrazolyl)methane (8) involves cooling the reaction mixture to 0 88C.
Which compound has a decomposition temperature of 205 88C?
True or False: The molecular structure of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6) is nearly planar due to intramolecular hydrogen bonds.
What is the role of H2O2 in the synthesis of bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7)?
data.answer: It is used to oxidize bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6) to yield bis(3,4,5-trinitropyrazolyl)methane (7).

data.question: Which compound is described as having a high heat resistance?
True or False: The synthesis of bis(4-amino-3,5-dinitropyrazolyl)methane (6) involves a chlorination step.
